note: The figures are the sum of famine deaths over each ten-year period (e.g., 1990â€“1999 for the 1990s), divided by population. The 2020s figure is provisional and includes data only up to and including 2023.
title: Death rate from large famines by decade
subtitle: Deaths in famines that are estimated to have killed 100,000 people or more. They are shown per 100,000 people in the population.
